DefaultEvent.Description: Your fingertips will always carry the scars, but the Name is gone.
DefaultEvent.Name: Your hand falls

ChildBranches.Name: Abandon the effort
ChildBranches.Description: You will lose the Name, and all your progress so far.

DefaultEvent.Description: "Find her," he said to you, "and you will find the treasures. Go down. You need only take a little. My aid is cheap. You will have what I promised." The light of his nimbus guttered, as if he were laughing. You knew nothing of the Neath, then. Perhaps you would never have come, if you did. Five letters. You remember the starlight.
DefaultEvent.Name: In utmost secrecy

ChildBranches.Name: $the White -> 白きもの$The fifth letter: the White
ChildBranches.Description: Recall who sent you here. That fierce old thing in the dark.

DefaultEvent.Description: "Find her," he said to you, "and you will find the treasures. Go down. You need only take a little. My aid is cheap. You will have what I promised." The gas-light guttered, as it were were laughing. You knew nothing of the Neath, then. Perhaps you would never have come, if you did. Five letters. You remember the scent of the winter air. The chime of a clock.
DefaultEvent.Name: In utmost secrecy

ChildBranches.Name: $Vienna -> ウィーン$The fifth letter: Vienna
ChildBranches.Description: Recall who sent you here. That fierce old thing in the dark.

DefaultEvent.Description:
$Kingeater's Castle -> 王喰らいの城$The Name is yours. Perhaps it always was - perhaps you're only coming home. The memories of your voyages are torn and blurred like a map in the rain. Other memories of other voyages press in on you - or emerge like mountains from your core.

You could almost go East. The way is written on the secret skin of your soul. But there are too many of you now. You must kill nearly all that you are. There's only one place in the Neath where you can do that. [You have found a secret victory condition. Go to Kingeater's Castle for the next step... and take the Carnelian Exile with you.]
DefaultEvent.Name: History compels

ChildBranches.Name: The last letter: the East
ChildBranches.Description: The traveller is always returning. One who does not is no traveller.

DefaultEvent.Description: You walked a while, considering his offer. The wind tugged at your sleeves; vapours swirled at your feet. The Neath was far from everything you had done and known. You might never return home. But that need, that need... Six letters. Look up. Hard gemmy lights in the black of the endless sky.
DefaultEvent.Name: Latticed shadows

ChildBranches.Name: The sixth letter: woods in winter
ChildBranches.Description: Recall that place of white and black, so cold after its season of heat.

DefaultEvent.Description: You walked a while, considering his offer. Radiations tugged at your sleeves; vapours swirled at your feet. The Neath was far from everything you had done and known. You might never return home. But that need, that need... Six letters. Look up. Hard gemmy lights in the black of the endless sky.
DefaultEvent.Name: Latticed corridors

ChildBranches.Name: The sixth letter: a palace of poisoned crystal
ChildBranches.Description: Recall that place of white and black, so cold after its season of heat.

Description: You are acquiring a Name. If you have a name, it must be yours. But who are you? This place crushes many identities into a single point. Who were you? Who will you be?
Name: The Name-Which-Burns
